summary: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.
cast: John Wayne|Glen Campbell|Kim Darby|Jeremy Slate|Robert Duvall|Dennis Hopper|Alfred Ryder|Strother Martin|Jeff Corey|Ron Soble|John Fiedler|James Westerfield|John Doucette|Donald Woods|Edith Atwater|Carlos Rivas|Isabel Boniface|H.W. Gim|John Pickard|Elizabeth Harrower|Ken Renard|Jay Ripley|Kenneth Becker|Leon Alton|Wilford Brimley|Forest Burns|Albert Cavens|Gene Coogan|Myron Healey|James McEachin|Dennis McMullen|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Robin Morse|Edna O'Dell|John Pedrini|General Sterling Price|Stuart Randall|Clark Ross|Connie Sawyer|Jeffrey Sayre|Jay Silverheels|Dean Smith|Vincent St. Cyr|Max Wagner|Guy Wilkerson|Chalky Williams|Hank Worden
title: Valor de ley
